adDetails: Hello I am an electrician and handyman with more of 18 years of experience and good references. I do clear and professional work and, all jobs under the National Electrical Code. -Residential or Commercial -New construction or remodeling (rewiring) -Main panel, sub-panel upgrade, installation on single-phase or 3-phase. -Motor and Transformer Installations, motion switches & devices, in/out door. -Install appliance: washer, dryer, Garbage Disposal, Dish washer machine, hook, Spa, Jacuzzi, light fixtures: recessed, surface, tracks, ceiling fans and more. -Pull wire of telephone, Data (by internet) and coaxial cable (TV) and expert trouble shooter for all electrical problems on: 120/240V, 120/208V, 277/480V circuits, etc. Other services include: -Dry wall repairs, painting & Basic Plumber. Please, Call or text to me at show contact info.
